document_data.mainbody:
orsa was a small town located in the kingdom of Callidyrr on the island of Alaron within the Moonshae Isles.
The town was situated within the Dernall Forest where the High Kings Road crossed the Swanmay River. Horsa lay within the county of Stagford, but was close to the borders of both Stirgewick to the south and Talffolk to the east.
